history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00159
FULL TITLE : AN ACT STRENGTHENING THE RIGHT OF GOVERNMENT TO EXPROPRIATE LANDS FOR SOCIALIZED HOUSING, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTIONS 9, 10, AND 11 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7279, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE ꞌURBAN DEVELOPMENT AND HOUSING ACT OF 1992ꞌ
SHORT TITLE : Strengthening The Right Of Government To Expropriate Lands For Socialized Housing
ABSTRACT : Provides Local Government Unit or the proper agency the power to identify and prioritize the particular area to be acquired for socialized housing. Exempts parcels of land owned by small property owners from expropriation for purposes of this Act. Ensures that the intended beneficiaries of RA7279 will enjoy the benefits of this Act.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BELMONTE, JOSE CHRISTOPHER Y., ROBES, FLORIDA "RIDA" P., TAMBUNTING, JOY MYRA S., AGABAS, TYRONE D., CABOCHAN, MANUEL III. D., REVILLA, STRIKE B., UMALI, ALFONSO JR.
